## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e362f345b793d07351dc6fd8c9b6e394aa19c97ebac52756a94ab250fcf7b557)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'zora1abs-mintflow-helper' @ 999.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
